text: Nirakarittavarkal tankal ullankalil (unkalai verutan alittuvita ventumenra) mutattanamana vairakkiyattai nilai niruttikkonta camayattai ninaittup parunkal. Accamayam allah tan tutar mitum, nampikkai kontavarkal mitum, tan arutalaiyum, urutiyaiyum irakki vaittup paricutta vakkiyattin mitu avarkalai urutippatuttinan. Avarkal atarkut takutiyutaiyavarkalakavum, atai ataiya ventiyavarkalakavum iruntarkal. Allah anaittaiyum nankarintavanaka irukkiran
